mapper.select: SELECT count(*) from mz_lis_line_interface where print_time between (#{today}) and (#{nextDay})
SELECT count(*) from mz_visit where visit_date between (#{today}) and (#{nextDay})
SELECT count (*)count FROM dbo.mz_charge_detail WHERE confirm_flag = '1'AND group_no <> '00' AND charge_date between (#{today}) and (#{nextDay})
SELECT count(*) FROM dbo.mz_charge_detail WHERE pay_mark = '0' AND charge_date between (#{today}) and (#{nextDay})
